meanings.sent1: The misspaced book was found under the bed.
meanings.sent2: The keys were misspaced on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: The misspaced socks ended up in the drawer for kitchen towels.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts felt misspaced, scattered like puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The misspaced painting on the wall caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To have put something in the wrong place
meanings.sent1: She misspaced her phone in her backpack.
meanings.sent2: He misspaced the important document in the wrong folder.
meanings.sent3: The magician misspaced the rabbit during the trick.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to misspace itself during the long journey.
meanings.sent5: The chef accidentally misspaced the salt for sugar in the recipe.
